mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.guiqin_types as guiqinTypes ,a.guiqin_time as guiqinTime ,a.sushe_guiqin_content as susheGuiqinContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM sushe_guiqin a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.guiqin_types = #{params.guiqinTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.guiqin_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.guiqinTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.guiqin_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.guiqinTimeEnd})
and a.sushe_guiqin_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.susheGuiqinContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
